display_long_description:
**FOR SCHOOLS:** Full access to all math and language modules, including advanced math modules. Currently available only in Dutch, with other languages under development and coming soon. Contact us at info@vronderwijs.nl for more information.
**FOR PRIVATE USERS:** Access to the basic math module and the language module for €43.99 per module per year.

Enhance math and language skills with our educational VR experience!  
- Discover lost knowledge with the help of the small robot KazaBot in a thrilling adventure.
- Practice math skills with challenging tasks that adhere to the educational standards.
- Improve language skills through active assignments and engaging stories.

Our VR lessons are developed in collaboration with experienced teachers and are aligned with the curriculum. Each module has been tested with real students, both in schools and at home. Whether you are a student, parent, or teacher, the app offers a fun and effective way to improve skills.

Additional features for schools:

- Access to a comprehensive teacher portal with progress reports and certificates for students.
- Regular updates and new modules based on user feedback and educational developments.
- Modules designed to make learning active and engaging.

Contact us for licenses, trial periods, and more information on how our VR app can enhance your educational experience.

**For ages 10 and up**
